problem.title: The Silent Threats to Your Small Business Online
problem.intro: You work hard to serve your customers, but is your website working hard for you? Many small business owners are unknowingly facing two major challenges that can cripple their online growth and lead to unexpected costs:

questions.title: The Rise of AI Search: Are You Invisible?
questions.description: Customers are increasingly using AI tools like ChatGPT and Perplexity to find information and businesses. If your website isn't optimized for these new search methods, you're missing out on a massive wave of potential customers. AI-driven referrals surged over 1000% last year, yet most websites aren't prepared.

questions.title: Accessibility Lawsuits: Are You at Risk?
questions.description: Websites are legally required to be accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities. If your site isn't compliant, you could face expensive lawsuits, fines, and damage to your reputation. These cases are on the rise, and small businesses are not exempt.

solution.title: Your All-in-One Solution for a Healthy, Profitable Website

points.title: Step 2: Assisted Fixes & One-Time Solutions (Get It Fixed)
points.description: Once you have your report, you might need a hand implementing the changes. We offer one-time services to help you fix specific issues, from optimizing your content for AI search to making your site legally accessible.

points.title: Step 3: Ongoing Monitoring & Automated Improvements (Stay Protected & Grow)
points.description: For ultimate peace of mind and continuous growth, our subscription plans provide ongoing monitoring of your website's SEO and accessibility. We'll alert you to new issues, suggest fresh content ideas for AI discoverability, and even automate certain fixes.
